an10.96:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando rājagahe viharati tapodārāme.
an10.96:1.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodā tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
an10.96:1.3: Tapodāya gattāni parisiñcitvā paccuttaritvā ekacīvaro aṭṭhāsi gattāni pubbāpayamāno.
an10.96:1.4: Kokanudopi kho paribbājako rattiyā paccūsasamayaṃ paccuṭṭhāya yena tapodā tenupasaṅkami gattāni parisiñcituṃ.
an10.96:2.1: Addasā kho kokanudo paribbājako āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
an10.96:4.1: “Puccheyyāma mayaṃ āyasmantaṃ kiñcideva desaṃ, sace āyasmā okāsaṃ karoti pañhassa veyyākaraṇāyā”ti.
an10.96:5.1: “Kiṃ nu kho, bho, ‘sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:6.1: “Kiṃ pana, bho, ‘asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti—evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:7.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.96:7.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—evaṃdiṭṭhi bhavan”ti?
an10.96:7.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’”ti.
an10.96:8.1: “Tena hi bhavaṃ na jānāti, na passatī”ti?
an10.96:8.2: “Na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, na jānāmi na passāmi.
an10.96:9.1: “‘Kiṃ nu kho, bho, sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
an10.96:9.4: sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:10.1: ‘Kiṃ pana, bho, asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
an10.96:10.4: asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:11.1: Kiṃ nu kho, bho, antavā loko …pe…
an10.96:11.7: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.96:11.8: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññanti—
an10.96:11.11: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti vadesi.
an10.96:12.1: ‘Tena hi bhavaṃ na jānāti na passatī’ti, iti puṭṭho samāno:
an10.96:12.2: ‘na kho ahaṃ, āvuso, na jānāmi na passāmi.
an10.96:12.4: Yathā kathaṃ panāvuso, imassa bhāsitassa attho daṭṭhabbo”ti?
an10.96:13.1: “‘Sassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti kho, āvuso, diṭṭhigatametaṃ.
an10.96:13.2: ‘Asassato loko, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti kho, āvuso, diṭṭhigatametaṃ.
an10.96:13.9: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā …
an10.96:13.10: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā, idameva saccaṃ moghamaññan’ti kho, āvuso, diṭṭhigatametaṃ.
an10.96:14.1: Yāvatā, āvuso, diṭṭhi yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhiadhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamuṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhisamugghāto, tamahaṃ jānāmi tamahaṃ passāmi.
an10.96:14.2: Tamahaṃ jānanto tamahaṃ passanto kyāhaṃ vakkhāmi:
an10.96:15.1: “Ko nāmo āyasmā, kathañca panāyasmantaṃ sabrahmacārī jānantī”ti?
an10.96:15.4: “Mahācariyena vata kira, bho, saddhiṃ mantayamānā na jānimha:
